items.title: Arch Linux Installation guide
items.description: Into ¬ß This is a very high level summary guide on installing Arch linux. This is not step by step tutorial for beginner. Prerequisite ¬ß Secure Boot Disabled Check if your system is UEFI or BOIS Burn the Arch linux iso on a usb device Installation ¬ß Reboot the machine pick usb device in bootloader and proceed to following.

items.title: Understanding the fundamentals of summation symbol (sigma) in mathematic
items.description: Summation Symbol (‚àë) ¬ß In mathematic the summation symbol capital sigma is generally used to reqpresents summation of similar terms. Simple Sum ¬ß For example, adding a sequence of number up to the n number starting from 1 can be compactly describe in this manner: i=1‚àën‚Äãi=1+2+3+.

items.title: Avoiding Sunk Cost Fallacy
items.description: What‚Äôs sunk cost anyway? ¬ß Sunk cost is the cost the has been put in motioned which cannot be recovered. For example, in practice this can mean money that‚Äôs has been used to purchase machinery in a manufacturing line or past effort and time that has been put towards a goal.

items.title: Unveiling Lasting Happiness
items.description: Discovering genuine and lasting happiness is a universal pursuit that goes beyond external achievements. Drawing inspiration from the principles of positive psychology, this article explores valuable insights on happiness.
